attributes.action: Drug test all MP’s weekly. No test, no job, no pay.
attributes.additional_details:
Traces of drug use has been found throughout all areas of Westminster toilets. 

This can not be tolerated. This would not be tolerated in any other workplace and not be tolerated in Westminster. They should be setting an example.

Drinking and drug abuse is not tolerated in any workplace why should Westminster be any different.
attributes.background:
All MP’s should be subjected to a weekly random drug test. This is the only way to stamp out drug use in Westminster and House of Commons.

If traces of drug use is found in any parts of Westminster corridors the internal bar areas should be closed for one Month until all traces cease.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory random drug tests every 6 months for all MPs, Lords & Special Advisors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596154

Mandatory drug tests for all MPs, Lords & their staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602604
